alert.note: Alert for South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BAY...SOUTHERN WALTON AND SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 159 PM EDT/1259 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs to near Lake Lorraine. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Red Bay, Portland, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Miramar Beach, Bruce, Red Head, Point Washington, Millers Ferry, Pine Log, Knox Hill, and Bunker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
